short_summary: Supplier to provide electrical control equipment (CONTROLLER Part No. 1000-115-110-1 NCAGE: U0AE1, B. HEPWORTH & CO)
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
full_summary:
# [Notice of Proposed Procurement]

**Reference Number:** PW-22-01016601
**Tender Closing Date:** January 16, 2023, 14:00:00
**Notice Publication Date:** December 12, 2022

**Description of the Requirement**

The Department of National Defence intends to acquire the following items:

* Controller, NSN 99-4744820, Quantity: 120
	+ Item 1: To be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax, Nova Scotia
	+ Item 2: To be delivered to Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Trade Agreements**

*Bidders must comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).*

**Language of Bid**

* Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada, English or French.

**Equivalent or Substitute Product**

* Bidders who propose an Equivalent or a Substitute Product, must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, and the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) Commercial and Government Entity (NCAGE) code.

**Submission of Prices**

* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Preference for Canadian Goods and/or Services**

* A preference for Canadian goods and/or services is in place.

**Submission of Bids**

* Bids must be submitted electronically through the Canada Buy website.
* Bidders must register for the opportunity on the Canada Buy website.
* Closing date for submission is 14:00:00, January 16, 2023.

**Contact Information**

* Ashley Nadeau-Weeks, Contracting Authority, Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, ashley.nadeau-weeks@forces.gc.ca

**Attachments**

* Amendment 001 in English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/29/3cdfb2a0f19c1c9b298183d7f04b9e1c/w8482-230738_amendment001_en.pdf>
* Amendment 001 in French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/29/8b44cb0967fb62883596351991734c9d/w8482-230738_amendment001_fr.pdf>
* Invitation to Bid
